spec_data.Name: rtv
spec_data.Description:
RTV provides an interface to view and interact with reddit from your terminal.
It's compatible with most terminal emulators on Linux and OS X.
RTV is built in python using the curses library.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 09:51:12 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A simple terminal viewer for Reddit (Reddit Terminal Viewer)
